name: LUCID (itch) (KatieChan09, djanova, EsotericSeph, drfillangee)
description:
--Description--

You are trapped in your own dream and must escape from the nightmarish creatures within by fighting your way through each area. With each enemy you defeat, you become more lucid and gain special ability power. Use this ability to power up your weapon of choice and quickly take down enemies. Collect your marbles to open new areas and ultimately make your way to the final boss. Defeat this nightmare and gain back your piece of mind so that you may awaken from this dream. Was it even real?

--Credits--

Developers: James Gage, Kaitlyn Cates, David Novotny, Levi Hahn

Art assets by: Synty
